item.title: 热带城市槟城如何在全球半导体大战中成为不可能的赢家。仅在 2023 年，马来西亚槟城获得的外国直接投资就超过了 2013 年至 2020 年的总和。
item.description:
How tropical Penang became an unlikely winner in the global semiconductor battle. The Malaysian state received more FDI in 2023 alone than 2013 to 2020 combined. https://t.co/mRLbPDRTgt via @ft

— Mercedes Ruehl (@mjruehl) March 11, 2024

item.title: 新调查：每年有数百吨来自废弃矿井的有毒金属泄漏到威尔士的土地和河流中，污染了牲畜和食品供应。国会议员要求威尔士和英国政府给予 "紧急关注"。报道：@Laura_K_Hughes
item.description:
New investigation: Hundreds of tonnes of toxic metals from abandoned mines leak into Welsh land and rivers each year, contaminating livestock and food supply. MPs demand 'urgent attention' from Welsh & UK govts. Reporting by @Laura_K_Hughes https://t.co/qAJsuQDZoq

— Charlotte Middlehurst (@charmiddle) March 11, 2024

item.title: 早上好，纽约，当你还在睡梦中时，我们关于私募股权投资集团坐拥创纪录数量的未出售公司、价值超过 30 亿美元的文章已成为阅读量最高的文章。
item.description:
Good morning New York, while you were sleeping, our piece on private equity groups sitting on a record number of unsold companies worth more than $3tn was our most read article https://t.co/tqbKIvsMt1

— Financial Times (@FT) March 11, 2024

item.title: Reddit 建立了庞大的广告业务，这是其去年 8 亿美元销售额的主要来源，但从未实现年度盈利。该公司在 2023 年录得 9100 万美元的亏损。还有人担心这笔交易可能会被 "memed"（备忘录）。
item.description:
Reddit has built a significant advertising business, which was the main contributor to its $800mn in sales last year, but has never made an annual profit. The company recorded a $91mn loss in 2023. There is also concern that the deal could get 'memed' https://t.co/drUYlBmwS9 pic.twitter.com/lQ8hPQwbsE

— Financial Times (@FT) March 11, 2024

item.title: 独家报道：Telegram 用户已达 9 亿，并接近盈利，公司正向潜在的股票上市大潮靠近
item.description:
Exclusive: Telegram has hit 900mn users and is nearing profitability, as the company moves closer to a potential blockbuster stock market listing https://t.co/DvqLw6918i pic.twitter.com/vgf3M0oNJY

— Financial Times (@FT) March 11, 2024

item.title: 从历史上看，法拉奇政党中具有明星效应的叛逃者迟早都会受到主要人物的影响。我想，这是对法拉奇是否真的要退休的一个很好的检验。
item.description:
Historically, defectors with star power to Farage parties have got under the main man’s skin sooner rather than later. A good test of whether Farage’s retirement is actually real, I guess. https://t.co/3cInINPhgY

— Stephen Bush (@stephenkb) March 11, 2024

item.title: 根据 FT-Michigan Ross 的最新民意调查，近一半的美国选民表示，他们现在生活 "舒适 "或能够 "应付开支并略有剩余"。
item.description:
Almost half of US voters said they were now living ‘comfortably’ or able to ‘meet expenses with a little left over’, according to the latest FT-Michigan Ross poll https://t.co/23c0n8bS3j pic.twitter.com/ESiOvN2koW

— Financial Times (@FT) March 11, 2024

item.title: 这是一场将改变整个制度的战斗。一名前警官摇身一变成为军阀，与海地政府对抗，组织大规模越狱，并将自己塑造成一名革命者。但谁是吉米-切里泽？
item.description:
'[This] is a battle that will change the whole system.'

An ex-police officer turned warlord has moved against Haiti’s government, organising a mass jailbreak and casting himself as a revolutionary. But who is Jimmy Cherizier? https://t.co/pEzSBNMIkx pic.twitter.com/jaUtleYCDb

— Financial Times (@FT) March 11, 2024

item.title: 新消息：游说公司在大选前为具有工党专业知识和人脉的政治活动家支付高价，因为公关执行人员称，他们看到大量保守党工作人员希望 "保送 "政府。W/ @rafeuddin_ @PickardJE
item.description:
NEW: Lobbying firms are paying a premium for political operatives with Labour expertise and contacts ahead of the election as PR execs say they are seeing a surfeit of Conservative staffers looking to “bail out” of government. W/ @rafeuddin_ @PickardJE https://t.co/nsu3QuAcbS

— Anna Gross (@AnnaSophieGross) March 11, 2024

item.title: 匈牙利奥威尔式的主权保护办公室于上月开始运作，表面上是为了防止外国资助政治活动。但批评人士警告说，该办公室的职权范围定义过于宽泛，可以针对任何公众人物。
item.description:
Hungary's Orwellian Sovereignty Protection Office started operating last month, ostensibly to prevent foreign financing in political campaigns. But critics have warned that its remit is so loosely defined that it can target any public figures https://t.co/VMBd6C6wFp via @mdunai

— Valentina Pop (@valentinapop) March 11, 2024

item.title: 在加沙，儿童正死于饥饿，而由于以色列的严厉检查，援助工作进展缓慢，许多家庭只能吃野草和动物饲料
item.description:
In Gaza, children are dying from hunger, while families are eating weeds and animal feed as tough Israeli inspections slow the progress of aid https://t.co/pYzOmrrjkA pic.twitter.com/ZD89VVcOWo

— Financial Times (@FT) March 11, 2024

item.title: 根据 @FT 获得的政府估算，每年至少有 500 吨有害金属从 129 个废弃金属矿泄漏到威尔士环境中。
item.description:
🚨 Part 1/2 stories looking at human health risks posed by abandoned metal mines across Britain.

At least 500 tonnes of harmful metals leak into the Welsh environment each year from just 129, according to government estimates obtained by the @FT
https://t.co/lLxlFqsQjl

— Laura Hughes (@Laura_K_Hughes) March 11, 2024
